text: The 2015 Sparkassen Open was a professional tennis tournament played on clay courts. It was the 22nd edition of the tournament which was part of the 2015 ATP Challenger Tour. It took place in Braunschweig, Germany between 6 and 11 July 2015. ==Singles main draw entrants== ===Seeds=== {|class="sortable wikitable" |- ! width="70"| Country ! width="175"| Player ! Rank1 ! Seed |- | |Pablo Carreño Busta |67 |1 |- | |Marcel Granollers |72 |2 |- | |Alexander Zverev |74 |3 |- | |João Souza |81 |4 |- | |Damir Džumhur |88 |5 |- | |Radu Albot |108 |6 |- | |Daniel Muñoz de la Nava |109 |7 |- | |Matthias Bachinger |110 |8 |} * 1 Rankings are as of June 29, 2015. ===Other entrants=== The following players received wildcards into the singles main draw: * Florian Mayer * Mischa Zverev * Maximilian Marterer * Daniel Brands The following players received entry as a special exempt into the singles main draw: * Nils Langer The following players received entry with a protected ranking: * Pere Riba The following players received entry as an alternate into the singles main draw: * Gastão Elias The following players received entry from the qualifying draw: * Rogério Dutra Silva * Dimitar Kuzmanov * Jason Kubler * Karen Khachanov ==Doubles main draw entrants== ===Seeds=== {|class="sortable wikitable" |- ! width="70"| Country ! width="175"| Player ! width="70"| Country ! width="175"| Player ! Rank1 ! Seed |- | |Julian Knowle | |Philipp Oswald |91 |1 |- | |Adil Shamasdin | |Santiago González |113 |2 |- | |Radu Albot | |Rameez Junaid |139 |3 |- | |Guillermo Durán | |Horacio Zeballos |168 |4 |} *1 Rankings as of June 29, 2015. ===Other entrants=== The following pairs received wildcards into the doubles main draw: * Alexander Zverev / Mischa Zverev * Simon Stadler / Jan-Lennard Struff * Nils Langer / Maximilian Marterer ==Champions== ===Singles=== * Filip Krajinović def. Paul-Henri Mathieu 6–2, 6–4 ===Doubles=== * Sergey Betov / Michail Elgin def. Damir Džumhur / Franko Škugor, 3–6, 6–1, [10–5] ==External links== *Official Website Sparkassen Open Category:Sparkassen Open
